review: So far so good! Love how fast it is

review: Fire Stick worked perfectly. Love the remote.
author: Paul Kelly Barron

review: I have a smart tv but love the Fire Tv Stick better. Plus we can use it while traveling! :)

review: it did not work at all and it was installed correctly.

review: This is the best thing sense the slice of bread ! NO buffering , NO skips , perfect quality . If you already have Amazon prime you would be crazy not to have the fire stick.
author: jeff matthies

review: Absolutely love this product, makes it so easy to watch anything you want/need.
author: Luis Quesada

review: Excellent way to stream Netflix, Amazon Prime video, and Sling TV. Rarely do I have to a streaming issue, the controls are intuitive and work fast.
author: Levi Allen

review: This thing is awesome!  Exceeded all my expectations.  It set up itself.  Just plug it in. As a prime member, it really is a great deal. it seems like an endless amount of movies and shows of all genres.
author: JLM73
